page.title: 17Religion
page.content: There are{two churches,}one in Costock and one in Rempstone.The Costock church is St Giles and the Rempstone church is All Saints. St giles was built in the 14th Cent. while All Saints was built in 1774. There was another church in Rempstone before All Saints called St Peters in the Rushes.All Saints was built from the stones of St Peters. There were Chapels in Costock and Rempstone but both have now been demolished. There is a nunnery in Rempstone called Holy Cross Convent.The nuns use Rempstone Hall to worship in.The Revd. John Smith is the Priest in charge of the Group Ministry of the above establishments and St Helena's Church West Leake,St Mary's Church East Leake,and St John The Baptist Church Stanford on Soar.
